org.opends.server.replication.server

Class LightweightServerHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.api.MonitorProvider<MonitorProviderCfg>
      • org.opends.server.replication.server.LightweightServerHandler

  • public class LightweightServerHandler
extends MonitorProvider<MonitorProviderCfg>
    This class defines a server handler dedicated to the remote LDAP servers connected to a remote Replication Server. This class is necessary because we want to provide monitor entries for them and because the monitor API only allows one entry by MonitorProvider instance so that no other class can provide the monitor entry for these objects. One instance of this class is created for each instance of remote LDAP server connected to a remote Replication Server.

      Creates a new LightweightServerHandler with the provided serverid, connected to the remote Replication Server represented by replServerHandler.

    • Constructor Detail

      • LightweightServerHandler

        public LightweightServerHandler(ReplicationServerHandler replServerHandler,
                        int replicationServerId,
                        int serverId,
                        java.lang.String serverUrl,
                        long generationId,
                        byte groupId,
                        ServerStatus status,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> refUrls,
                        boolean assuredFlag,
                        AssuredMode assuredMode,
                        byte safeDataLevel,
                        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> eclInclude,
                        java.util.Set<java.lang.String> eclIncludeForDeletes,
                        short protocolVersion)
        Creates a new LightweightServerHandler with the provided serverid, connected to the remote Replication Server represented by replServerHandler.
        Parameters:
        replServerHandler - The server handler of the RS this remote DS is connected to
        replicationServerId - The serverId of the RS this remote DS is connected to
        serverId - The serverId of this remote DS.
        serverUrl - The serverUrl of this remote DS.
        generationId - The generation id of this remote DS.
        groupId - The group id of the remote DS
        status - The id of the remote DS
        refUrls - The exported referral URLs of the remote DS
        assuredFlag - The assured flag of the remote DS
        assuredMode - The assured mode of the remote DS
        safeDataLevel - The safe data level of the remote DS
        eclInclude - The list of entry attributes to be added to the ECL.
        eclIncludeForDeletes - The list of entry attributes to be added to the ECL.
        protocolVersion - The protocol version supported by the remote DS.
